GS41brsphutu:1: [D: x > y] indicates that Dvivedin, the editor, suggests the reading, y,
GS41brsphutu:4: [Cb.n] indicates that the stanza is given the number, n, in Colebrooke's
GS41brsphutu:6: [Cb.@] indicates that the stanza does not exist in Colebrooke's
GS41brsphutu:8: Otherwise, the stanza number coincides with Colebrooke's one.
GS41brsphutu:9: (Colebrooke's translation is available for Chapters 12 and 18 only. In Chapter 12, all the stanza numbers given by Dvivedin coincide with
GS41brsphutu:11: As Chapter 20, on combinatrics concerning Sanskrit prosody, has not been
GS41brsphutu:12: deciphered yet, the text of that chapter is left exactly as it is in
GS41brsphutu:13: Dvivedin's edition without decomposition of compounds and sandhi.
GS41brsphutu:16: BSS_12.1a/ parikarma-%viṃśatim yas saṅkalita-ādyām pṛthak vijānāti/
GS41brsphutu:17: BSS_12.1c/ %aṣṭau ca vyavahārān chāyā-antān bhavati gaṇakas sas//
GS41brsphutu:19: BSS_12.2c/ saṅkalite aṃśās yojyās vyavakalite aṃśa-antaram kāryam//
GS41brsphutu:20: BSS_12.3a/ rūpāṇi cheda-guṇāni aṃśa-yutāni %dvayos bahūnām vā/
GS41brsphutu:21: BSS_12.3c/ pratyutpannas bhavati cheda-vadhena uddhṛtas aṃśa-vadhas//
GS41brsphutu:24: BSS_12.4c/ aṃśas aṃśa-guṇas bhājyasya bhāga-hāras savarṇitayos//
GS41brsphutu:29: BSS_12.6c/ uttara-kṛtis antya-guṇā %tri-guṇā ca uttara-ghanas ca ghanas//
GS41brsphutu:34: BSS_12.8c/ aṃśais aṃśās guṇitās chedais chedās %dvitīyāyām//
GS41brsphutu:37: BSS_12.9c/ chedais chedās guṇitās sva-aṃśa-yuta-ūnais upari-ga-aṃśās//
GS41brsphutu:38: BSS_12.10a/ trairāśike pramāṇam phalam iccā ādi-antayos sadṛśa-rāśī/
GS41brsphutu:39: BSS_12.10c/ icchā phalena guṇitā pramāṇa-bhaktā phalam bhavati//
GS41brsphutu:44: BSS_12.12c/ sakaleṣu evam bhinneṣu ubhaya-tas cheda-saṅkramaṇam//
GS41brsphutu:45: BSS_12.13a/ prāk mūlya-vyatyāsas bhāṇḍapratibhāṇḍake anyat ukta-samam/
GS41brsphutu:48: BSS_12.14a/ kāla-guṇitam pramāṇam phala-bhaktam vi-%eka-guṇa-hatam kālas/
GS41brsphutu:52: BSS_12.16a/ prakṣepa-yoga-hṛtayā labdhyā prakṣepakās guṇās lābhās/
GS41brsphutu:55: BSS_12.17a/ padam %eka-hīnam uttara-guṇitam saṃyuktam ādinā antya-dhanam/
GS41brsphutu:66: BSS_12.20c/ ghana-saṅkalitam tad-kṛtis eṣām sama-golakais citayas//
GS41brsphutu:76: BSS_12.24a/ karṇa-kṛtes koṭi-kṛtim viśodhya mūlam bhujas bhujasya kṛtim/
GS41brsphutu:77: BSS_12.24c/ prohya padam koṭis koṭi-bāhu-kṛti-yuti-padam karṇas// [D: vāhu
GS41brsphutu:80: BSS_12.25c/ sva-āvādhe sva-yuti-hṛte dvidhā pṛthak karṇa-lamba-guṇe//
GS41brsphutu:89: BSS_12.28c/ yogena bhuja-pratibhuja-vadhayos karṇau pade viṣame//
GS41brsphutu:92: BSS_12.29c/ karṇa-%dvayena pūrva-vat āvādhe lambakau ca pṛthak//
GS41brsphutu:95: BSS_12.30c/ pṛthak ūrdhva-adhara-khaṇḍe karṇa-yutau karṇayos adhare//
GS41brsphutu:96: BSS_12.31a/ %tri-bhje bhujau tu bhūmis tad-lambas lambaka-adharam khaṇḍam/
GS41brsphutu:99: BSS_12.32c/ anupātena tad-ūne ūrdhve sūcyām sa-pāṭāyām//
GS41brsphutu:100: BSS_12.33a/ kṛti-yutis asadṛśa-rāśyos bāhus ghātas %dvi-saṅguṇas lambas/
GS41brsphutu:106: BSS_12.35a/ iṣṭasya bhujasya kṛtis bhaktā ūnā iṣṭena tad-dalam koṭis/
GS41brsphutu:108: BSS_12.36a/ āyata-karṇas bāhū bhuja-kṛtis iṣṭena bhājitā iṣṭa-ūnā/
GS41brsphutu:112: BSS_12.37c/ bāhu-kṛtes %tri-guṇāyās yadi adhikas bhūs mukham hīnas//
GS41brsphutu:115: BSS_12.38c/ adhikas bhūs mukha-hīnas bāhu-%dvitayam bhujau anyau//
GS41brsphutu:120: BSS_12.41a/ vṛtte śara-ūna-guṇitāt vyāsāt %catur-āhatāt padam jīvā/
GS41brsphutu:126: BSS_12.43c/ śarayos phalayos aikyam grāsas grāsa-ūnam aikyam tat//
GS41brsphutu:133: BSS_12.45c/ mukha-tala-gaṇita-aikya-%ardham vedha-guṇam syāt gaṇitam autram//
GS41brsphutu:134: BSS_12.46a/ autra-gaṇitāt viśodhya vyavahāra-phalam bhajet %tribhis śeṣam/
GS41brsphutu:135: BSS_12.46c/ labdham vyavahāra-phale prakṣipya bhavati phalam sūkṣmam//
GS41brsphutu:142: BSS_12.48c/ kiṣku-aṅgulāni labdham tat %ṣaṇṇavatis bhavati karma//
GS41brsphutu:150: BSS_12.51c/ prāk-vat kṛtvā gaṇitam tad-gaṇitam sva-guṇa-kāra-hṛtam//
GS41brsphutu:156: BSS_12.53c/ dīpa-śikha-auccyāt śaṅkum viśodhya śeṣa-uddhṛtam chāyā//
GS41brsphutu:157: BSS_12.54a/ chāyā-agra-antara-guṇitā chāyā chāyā-antareṇa bhaktā bhūs/
GS41brsphutu:158: BSS_12.54c/ bhūs śaṅku-guṇā chāyā-vibhājitā dīpa-śikhayā auccyam//
GS41brsphutu:162: BSS_12.56a/ guṇyas rāśis guṇa-kāra-rāśinā iṣṭa-adhika-ūnakena guṇas/
GS41brsphutu:164: BSS_12.57a/ chedena iṣṭa-yuta-ūnena āptam bhājyāt anaṣṭam iṣṭa-guṇam/
GS41brsphutu:166: BSS_12.58a/ guṇyas cheda-phala-vadhas guṇaka-hṛtas guṇya-bhājitas guṇakas/
GS41brsphutu:167: BSS_12.58c/ cheda-uddhṛtas phalam guṇya-guṇa-vadhas phala-hṛtas chedas//
GS41brsphutu:169: BSS_12.59c/ teṣām dṛśyau vyastau kṛtvā tad-sthānayos ca iṣṭau//
GS41brsphutu:170: BSS_12.60a/ guṇyam guṇa-kāram vā guṇayet chedena bhāga-hārasya/
GS41brsphutu:172: BSS_12.61a/ acchedasya chedam rūpam kṛtvā anyat ukta-vat sarvam/
GS41brsphutu:173: BSS_12.61c/ apavartyau cheda-guṇau tulyena iṣṭena guṇyau vā//[D:
GS41brsphutu:178: BSS_12.63a/ rāśes ūnam %dvi-guṇam bahutara-guṇam ūna-kṛti-yutam vargas/
GS41brsphutu:179: BSS_12.63c/ rāśes iṣṭa-yuta-ūnāt vadhas kṛtis vā iṣṭa-kṛti-yuktas//
GS41brsphutu:182: BSS_12.65a/ sthāna-antareṣu labdham yena samam phala-yuta-ūnaka-chedas/
GS41brsphutu:183: BSS_12.65c/ dalitas kṛti-yoga-antara-padam itaras vā phala-yuta-ūnas//
GS41brsphutu:184: BSS_12.66a/ dik-mātram etat anyat jyā-utpattau kuṭṭake ca kathayiṣye/
GS41brsphutu:188: BSS_18.1a/ prāyeṇa yatas praśnās kuṭṭākārāt ṛte na śakyante/
GS41brsphutu:189: BSS_18.1c/ jñātum vakṣyāmi tatas kuṭṭākāram saha praśnais//
GS41brsphutu:191: BSS_18.2c/ ācāryas tantra-vidām jñātais varga-prakṛtyā ca//
GS41brsphutu:194: BSS_18.3c/ yat tat paraspara-hṛtam labdham adhas adhas pṛthak sthāpyam//
GS41brsphutu:195: BSS_18.4a/ śeṣam tathā iṣṭa-guṇitam yathā agrayos antareṇa saṃyuktam/
GS41brsphutu:196: BSS_18.4c/ śudhyati guṇakas sthāpyas labdham ca antyāt upāntya-guṇas//
GS41brsphutu:203: BSS_18.7a/ bha-gaṇa-ādi-śeṣam agram cheda-hṛtam kham ca
GS41brsphutu:206: BSS_18.8a/ dina-ja-bha-gaṇa-ādi-śeṣam yena guṇam maṇḍala-ādi śeṣakayos/
GS41brsphutu:208: BSS_18.9a/ hṛtayos parasparam yat cheṣam guṇa-kāra-bhāga-hārakayos/
GS41brsphutu:209: BSS_18.9c/ tena hṛtau nis-chedau tau eva parasparam hṛtayos// [Cb.11]
GS41brsphutu:210: BSS_18.10a/ labdham adhas adhas sthāpyam tathā iṣṭa-guṇa-kāra-saṅguṇam
GS41brsphutu:212: BSS_18.10c/ śudhyati yathā %eka-hīnam guṇakas sthāpyas phalam ca antyāt//
GS41brsphutu:213: BSS_18.11a/ agra-antam upāntyena sva-ūrdhvas guṇitas antya-saṃyutas
GS41brsphutu:220: BSS_18.13a/ evam sameṣu viṣameṣu ṛṇam dhanam dhanam ṛṇam yat uktam tat/
GS41brsphutu:222: BSS_18.14a/ guṇakas chedas chedas guṇakas dhanam ṛṇam ṛṇam dhanam kāryam/
GS41brsphutu:223: BSS_18.14c/ vargam padam padam kṛtis antyāt viparītam ādyam tat// [Cb.17]
GS41brsphutu:224: BSS_18.15a/ yas jānāti yuga-ādi graha-yuga-yātais pṛthak pṛthak kathitais/
GS41brsphutu:226: BSS_18.16a/ bha-gaṇa-ādyam iṣṭa-śeṣam kadā indu-divase raves guru-dine vā/
GS41brsphutu:227: BSS_18.16c/ jña-dine rāśīn kathayati kuṭṭākāram sas jānāti// [Cb.19]
GS41brsphutu:228: BSS_18.17a/ jña-dine yat aṃśa-śeṣam vikalā-śeṣam kadā tat indu-dine/
GS41brsphutu:229: BSS_18.17c/ bhānos atha vā śaśinas yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:230: BSS_18.18a/ tithi-māna-dineṣu iṣṭās ye arka-ādyās te punar kadā teṣu/
GS41brsphutu:231: BSS_18.18c/ iṣṭa-graha-vāreṣu yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas// [Cb.21]
GS41brsphutu:232: BSS_18.19a/ iṣṭa-bha-gaṇa-ādi-śeṣāt dyu-gaṇas tat kuṭṭakena saṃyuktas/
GS41brsphutu:233: BSS_18.19c/ tad-cheda-dinais tāvat dina-vāras yāvat iṣṭas syāt// [Cb.22]
GS41brsphutu:234: BSS_18.20a/ yas rāśi-ādīn dṛṣṭvā madhyasya iṣṭasya katahyati dyu-gaṇam/
GS41brsphutu:237: BSS_18.21c/ bha-gaṇa-kalābhis labdham maṇḍala-śeṣam dina-gaṇas asmāt//
GS41brsphutu:239: BSS_18.22c/ naṣṭa-stheṣu iṣṭān tān kṛtvā bhaktvā ukta-vat śeṣam// [Cb.25]
GS41brsphutu:241: BSS_18.23c/ yas sādhayati uparitanān sa-madhyamān kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:242: BSS_18.24a/ yena guṇas śeṣa-yutas chedas śudhyati hṛtas sva-guṇakena/
GS41brsphutu:243: BSS_18.24c/ tad-bhuktam śeṣam phalam evam śeṣāt graha-dyu-gaṇau// [Cb.27]
GS41brsphutu:244: BSS_18.25a/ jānāti yas yuga-gatam kathitāt adhimāsa-śeṣakāt iṣṭāt/
GS41brsphutu:245: BSS_18.25c/ avama-avaśeṣatas vā tad-yogāt vā sas kuṭṭa-jñas// [Cb.28]
GS41brsphutu:247: BSS_18.26c/ bhūyas te yas kathayati pṛthak pṛthak vā sas kuṭṭa-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:250: BSS_18.27c/ %navabhis guṇam sa-rūpam kadā %śatam budha-dine savitus//
GS41brsphutu:258: BSS_18.30a/ dhanayos dhanam ṛṇam ṛṇayos dhana-ṛṇayos antaram sama-aikyam
GS41brsphutu:260: BSS_18.30c/ ṛṇam aikyam ca dhanam ṛṇa-dhana-śūnyayos śūnyayos śūnyam//
GS41brsphutu:261: BSS_18.31a/ ūnam adhikāt viśodhyam dhanam dhanāt ṛṇam ṛṇāt adhikam ūnāt/
GS41brsphutu:262: BSS_18.31c/ vyastam tad-antaram syāt ṛṇam dhanam dhanam ṛṇam bhavati//
GS41brsphutu:263: BSS_18.32a/ śūnya-vihīnam ṛṇam ṛṇam dhanam dhanam bhavati śūnyam
GS41brsphutu:265: BSS_18.32c/ śodhyam yadā dhanam ṛṇāt ṛṇam dhanāt vā tadā kṣepyam// [Cb.33]
GS41brsphutu:266: BSS_18.33a/ ṛṇam ṛṇa-dhanayos ghātas dhanam ṛṇayos dhana-vadhas dhanam
GS41brsphutu:268: BSS_18.33c/ śūnya-ṛṇayos kha-dhanayos kha-śūnyayos vā vadhas śūnyam//
GS41brsphutu:269: BSS_18.34a/ dhana-bhaktam dhanam ṛṇa-hṛtam ṛṇam dhanam bhavati kham
GS41brsphutu:271: BSS_18.34c/ bhaktam ṛṇena dhanam ṛṇam dhanena hṛtam ṛṇam ṛṇam bhavati//
GS41brsphutu:272: BSS_18.35a/ kha-uddhṛtam ṛṇam dhanam vā tad-chedam kham
GS41brsphutu:274: BSS_18.35c/ ṛṇa-dhanayos vargas svam kham khasya padam kṛtis yat tat//
GS41brsphutu:280: BSS_18.37a/ karaṇī lambas tad-kṛtis iṣṭa-hṛtā iṣṭa-ūna-saṃyutā alpā bhūs/
GS41brsphutu:281: BSS_18.37c/ adhikas %dvi-hṛtas bāhus saṃkṣepyas yad-vadhas vargas//
GS41brsphutu:285: BSS_18.38c/ guṇyas tiryak adhas adhas guṇaka-samas tad-guṇas sahitas//
GS41brsphutu:286: BSS_18.39a/ sva-iṣṭa-ṛṇa-cheda-guṇau bhājya-chedau pṛthak yujau asakṛt/
GS41brsphutu:287: BSS_18.39c/ cheda-%eka-gata-hṛtas vā bhājyas vargas sama-%dvi-vadhas//
GS41brsphutu:289: BSS_18.40c/ %prathamam rūpāṇi anyat tatas dvitīyam karaṇī asakṛt// [Cb.41]
GS41brsphutu:296: BSS_18.43a/ avyakta-antara-bhaktam vyastam rūpa-antaram same avyaktas/
GS41brsphutu:297: BSS_18.43c/ varga-avyaktās śodhyās yasmāt rūpāṇi tad-adhastāt// [Cb.44]
GS41brsphutu:299: BSS_18.44c/ mūlam nadhyena ūnam varga-%dvi-guṇa-uddhṛtam madhyas// [Cb.48]
GS41brsphutu:301: BSS_18.45c/ padam avyakta-%ardha-ūnam tat varga-vibhaktam avyaktas//
GS41brsphutu:304: BSS_18.46c/ sa-%eka-aṃśa-śeṣa-tulyas yadā tadā ahar-gaṇam kathaya//
GS41brsphutu:307: BSS_18.47c/ adhimāsa-śeṣa-tulyam yadā tadā yuga-gatam kathaya// [Cb.46]
GS41brsphutu:310: BSS_18.48c/ %pañca-vibhaktasya samam yadā tadā yuga-gatam kathaya//
GS41brsphutu:313: BSS_18.49c/ maṇḍala-śeṣam vi-%ekam bhānos jña-dine kadā bhavati//
GS41brsphutu:315: BSS_18.50c/ avama-avaśeṣatas vā avama-śeṣa-samas kadā bhavati// [Cb.51]
GS41brsphutu:317: BSS_18.51a/ ādyāt varṇāt anyān varṇān prohya ādya-mānam āḍya-hṛtam/
GS41brsphutu:318: BSS_18.51c/ sadṛśa-chedau asakṛt %dvau vyastau kuṭṭakas bahuṣu// [Cb.52]
GS41brsphutu:321: BSS_18.52c/ tad-yogāt dyu-gaṇam vā yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:322: BSS_18.53a/ gata-bhagaṇa-ūnāt dyu-gaṇāt tad-śeṣa-ūnāt tad-aikya-hīnāt vā/
GS41brsphutu:323: BSS_18.53c/ tad-vivarāt dyu-gaṇam vā yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:324: BSS_18.54a/ rāśi-ādyais tad-śeṣais ca evam bhukta-adhimāsa-dina-hīnais/
GS41brsphutu:325: BSS_18.54c/ tad-śeṣais ca yuga-gatam yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:326: BSS_18.55a/ aṃśaka-śeṣeṇa yutāt liptā-śeṣāt tad-antarāt atha vā/
GS41brsphutu:327: BSS_18.55c/ bhānos jña-dine dyu-gaṇam yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
GS41brsphutu:328: BSS_18.56a/ aṃśaka-śeṣam %tri-yutam liptā-śeṣam kadā raves jña-dine/
GS41brsphutu:329: BSS_18.56c/ %ṣaṭ %sapta %aṣṭau %nava vā kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
GS41brsphutu:330: BSS_18.57a/ aṃśa-samam aṃśa-śeṣam kalā-samam vā kalā-śeṣam/
GS41brsphutu:331: BSS_18.57c/ divasa-karasya iṣṭa-dine kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.58]
GS41brsphutu:333: BSS_18.58c/ iṣṭa-yuta-ūnam tulyam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.59]
GS41brsphutu:335: BSS_18.59c/ śudhyati %ayuta-vibhaktas kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.60]
GS41brsphutu:339: BSS_18.60c/ alpe adhikas adhike alpas kṣepyas bhāvita-hṛtau vyastam//
GS41brsphutu:342: BSS_18.61c/ %navatim dṛṣṭvā sūryam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.62]
GS41brsphutu:344: BSS_18.62c/ kṛtvā iṣṭāni tad-āhata-varṇa-aikyam bhavati rūpāṇi// [Cb.66]
GS41brsphutu:346: BSS_18.63c/ sidhyati vinā api bhāvita-sama-karaṇāt kim kṛtam tat atas//
GS41brsphutu:348: BSS_18.64a/ mūlam dvidhā iṣṭa-vargāt guṇaka-guṇāt iṣṭa-yuta-vihīnāt ca/
GS41brsphutu:349: BSS_18.64c/ ādya-vadhas guṇaka-guṇas saha antya-ghātena kṛtam antyam//
GS41brsphutu:353: BSS_18.66c/ kṛtvā antya-ādya-pade ye prakṣepe śodhane vā iṣṭe// [Cb.68]
GS41brsphutu:362: BSS_18.69a/ varge guṇake kṣepas kena cit uddhṛta-yuta-ūnitas dalitas/
GS41brsphutu:366: BSS_18.70c/ varga-chinne kṣepe tad-pada-guṇite tadā mūle// [Cb.75]
GS41brsphutu:368: BSS_18.71c/ guṇakau %tri-guṇau vyasta-adhikau hṛtau antareṇa pade//
GS41brsphutu:371: BSS_18.72c/ tad-guṇitau yuti-viyutau vargau ghāte ca rūpa-yute// [Cb.72]
GS41brsphutu:372: BSS_18.73a/ yais ūnas yais ca yutas rūpais vargas tad-aikyam iṣṭa-hṛtam/
GS41brsphutu:373: BSS_18.73c/ iṣṭa-ūnam tad-dala-kṛtis ūnā abhyadhikā bhavati rāśis//
GS41brsphutu:374: BSS_18.74a/ yābhyām kṛtis adhika-ūnas tad-antaram hṛta-yuta-ūnam iṣṭena/
GS41brsphutu:375: BSS_18.74c/ tad-dala-kṛtis adhika-ūnā adhikayos adhika-ūnayos rāśis//
GS41brsphutu:378: BSS_18.75c/ sa-%ekā jña-dine vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.67]
GS41brsphutu:380: BSS_18.76c/ varge bṛhaspati-dine kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.86]
GS41brsphutu:383: BSS_18.77c/ kṛtim %aṣṭa-%śata-ūnam vā kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.70]
GS41brsphutu:385: BSS_18.78c/ %ṣaṣṭi-ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.74]
GS41brsphutu:387: BSS_18.79c/ rūpeṇa yutam vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.87]
GS41brsphutu:389: BSS_18.80c/ %tri-ghana-ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.72]
GS41brsphutu:391: BSS_18.81c/ pṛthak %eka-yutam vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.79]
GS41brsphutu:393: BSS_18.82c/ %tribhis ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.76]
GS41brsphutu:395: BSS_18.83c/ vargam vadham ca sa-%ekam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.81]
GS41brsphutu:397: BSS_18.84c/ bhānos jña-dine vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.85]
GS41brsphutu:399: BSS_18.85c/ %ṣaṣṭyā %aṣṭabhis ca ūnam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.83]
GS41brsphutu:401: BSS_18.86c/ atha vā madhyamam iṣṭam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.88]
GS41brsphutu:403: BSS_18.87c/ ravim indu-bhāga-śeṣāt kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.89]
GS41brsphutu:406: BSS_18.88c/ cheda-dinais adhikas asmāt anya-graha-śeṣam iṣṭas vā// [Cb.90]
GS41brsphutu:407: BSS_18.89a/ nis-cheda-bhāga-hārau grahayos viparītau grahayos dyu-gaṇāt/
GS41brsphutu:410: BSS_18.90a/ nis-cheda-bhāga-hārau viparītau tad-yutāt punar tasmāt/
GS41brsphutu:411: BSS_18.90c/ śeṣe dyu-gaṇāt evam %tri-ādīnām prāk-vat iṣṭa-dine// [Cb.91]
GS41brsphutu:412: BSS_18.91a/ dyu-gaṇam avama-avaśeṣāt ravi-candrau madhyamau sphuṭau atha
GS41brsphutu:414: BSS_18.91c/ evam tithim graham vā kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas// [Cb.92]
GS41brsphutu:417: BSS_18.92c/ śudhyati bhū-dina-bhaktam vi-%ekam cāndrais tad-uktis iyam//
GS41brsphutu:422: BSS_18.94c/ iṣṭa-avama-śeṣāt yat śeṣam ravi-bha-gaṇa-śeṣam tat// [Cb.95]
GS41brsphutu:425: BSS_18.95c/ śeṣam avama-avaśeṣāt tithayas avama-śeṣakāt vikalam// [Cb.96]
GS41brsphutu:426: BSS_18.96a/ bhāga-kalā-vikalā-aikyam dṛṣṭvā vikalā-antaram ca ke śeṣe/
GS41brsphutu:427: BSS_18.96c/ aikyam dvidhā antara-adhika-hīnam ca %dvi-bhājitam śeṣe//
GS41brsphutu:430: BSS_18.97c/ varga-antaram vibhaktam %dvābhyām śeṣe tatas dyu-gaṇas// [Cb.
GS41brsphutu:432: BSS_18.98c/ tena yuta-ūnas yogas dalitas śeṣe pṛthak abhīṣṭe// Cb.99]
GS41brsphutu:434: BSS_18.99c/ śeṣa-antara-ūna-yuktam dalitam śeṣe pṛthak abhīṣṭe// [Cb.100]
GS41brsphutu:435: BSS_18.100a/ hṛdi-ghātram amī praśnās praśnān anyān %sahasra-śas kuryāt/
GS41brsphutu:437: BSS_18.100c/ anyais dattān praśnān uktyā evam sādhayet karaṇais// [Cb.101]
GS41brsphutu:438: BSS_18.101a/ jana-saṃsadi daiva-vidām tejas nāśayati bhānus iva bhānām/
GS41brsphutu:439: BSS_18.101c/ kuṭṭākāra-praśnais pathitais api kim punar %śata-śas//
GS41brsphutu:441: BSS_18.102a/ prati-sūtram amī praśnās pathitās sa-uddeśakeṣu sūtreṣu/
GS41brsphutu:442: BSS_18.102c/ āryā-%tri-adhika-%śatena ca kuṭṭas ca %aṣṭādaśas adhyāyas//
GS41brsphutu:446: BSS_19.1a/ dṛṣṭvā dina-%ardha-ghaṭikā yas arka-jñas akṣa-aṃśakān vijānāti/
GS41brsphutu:447: BSS_19.1c/ udaya-antara-ghaṭikābhis jñātāt jñeyam sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:448: BSS_19.2a/ asta-antara-ghaṭikābhis yas jñātāt jñeyam ānayati tastmāt/
GS41brsphutu:449: BSS_19.2c/ madhya-gatim yuga-bha-gaṇān ānayati tatas sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:452: BSS_19.4a/ iṣṭa-gṛha-auccya-jñas yas tad-antara-jñas nirīkṣyate tu jale/
GS41brsphutu:453: BSS_19.4c/ gṛha-bhitti-agram darśayati darpaṇe vā sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:455: BSS_19.5c/ śaṅku-chāyā-jñas vā bhūmes chāyām sas tantra-jñas// [D: śaṅka-
GS41brsphutu:457: BSS_19.6a/ dṛṣṭvā gṛha-tala-antara-jālabhos dṛṣṭvā agram gṛhasya
GS41brsphutu:460: BSS_19.6c/ vetti gṛha-auccyam dṛṣṭvā taila-stham vā sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:461: BSS_19.7a/ vīkṣya gṛha-agram salile prasārya salilam punar sva-bhū-jñāne/
GS41brsphutu:462: BSS_19.7c/ ānayati jalāt bhūmim gṛhasya vā auccyam sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:463: BSS_19.8a/ jñātais chāyā-puruṣais vijñāte toya-kuḍyayos vivare/
GS41brsphutu:464: BSS_19.8c/ kuḍye arka-tejasas yas vetti ārūḍhim sas tantra-jñas//
GS41brsphutu:467: BSS_19.9c/ tad-divasa-cara-prāṇās tais akṣam sādhayet prāk-vat//
GS41brsphutu:469: BSS_19.10c/ udayais jñātas jñātāt jñeyas prāk-aparayos jñeyas//
GS41brsphutu:472: BSS_19.11c/ jñātāt pūrva-aparayos jñeyas bha-%ardha-ūnake jñeyas//
GS41brsphutu:473: BSS_19.12a/ jñātam kṛtvā madhyam bhūyas anya-dine tad-antaram bhuktis/
GS41brsphutu:475: BSS_19.13a/ sthiti-%ardhāt viparītam tamas-pramāṇam sphuṭam grahaṇe/
GS41brsphutu:478: BSS_19.14c/ dīpa-śikha-auccyāt śaṅkum viśodhya śeṣa-uddhṛtam chāyā//
GS41brsphutu:479: BSS_19.15a/ śaṅku-antareṇa guṇitā chāyā chāyā-antareṇa bhaktā bhūs /
GS41brsphutu:480: BSS_19.15c/ sa-chāyā śaṅku-guṇā dīpa-auccyam chāyayā bhaktā//
GS41brsphutu:481: BSS_19.16a/ jñātvā śaṅku-chāyām anupātāt sādhayet samucchrāyān/
GS41brsphutu:482: BSS_19.16c/ gṛha-caitya-taru-nagānām auccyam vijñāya vā chāyām//
GS41brsphutu:485: BSS_19.17c/ phala-bhūs nyaste toye prati-rūpa-agram gṛhasya narāt//
GS41brsphutu:488: BSS_19.18c/ gṛha-toya-antaram auccyam gṛhasya nṛ-jala-antareṇa hṛtam//
GS41brsphutu:491: BSS_19.19c/ dṛṣṭi-auccya-guṇā ucchrāyas toyāt nṛ-jala-antara-guṇā bhūs//
GS41brsphutu:501: BSS_20.4a/ sūnontyo dvipadāgraṃ tripadādyānāmadhaḥ pṛthak saṃkhyā/
GS41brsphutu:510: BSS_20.8c/ saṃkhyaikyaṃ tādṛk yādṛk prathamas trirahito naṣṭe//
GS41brsphutu:511: BSS_20.9a/ mādhyaiḥ kṛtaiś ca dalitaiḥ samasaṃkhyāyāṃ kramotkramāt
GS41brsphutu:513: BSS_20.9c/ viṣamāyāṃ vyekāyāṃ dalam kramād uttkramāt saikam//
GS41brsphutu:515: BSS_20.10c/ kalpyā pacite dṛṣṭe prathamaḥ śeṣākṣarāṇyante//
GS41brsphutu:517: BSS_20.11c/ svādyavadho'nyaiḥ pādaiḥ svaparasya prāgvadhaḥ saikaiḥ//
GS41brsphutu:521: BSS_20.13c/ vyekaḥ pṛthak svavargoddhṛtaḥ phalaṃ tulyakalyānām//
GS41brsphutu:522: BSS_20.14a/ uddiṣṭe kalpahṛte'tītaiḥ prathamaḥ phale sarūpe 'nyaḥ/
GS41brsphutu:528: BSS_20.17a/ laghusaṃkhyā padadalitā parato'dho'dhaś ca śudhyati hṛtā yaiḥ/
GS41brsphutu:529: BSS_20.17c/ dviguṇāntaiḥ śuddhair vargaparair mandaro laghubhiḥ//
GS41brsphutu:531: BSS_20.18c/ svāt parato'nyaikyam adhaḥ prastārād uktavad ihādyaiḥ//
GS41brsphutu:537: BSS_21.17a/ rāśi-%aṣṭa-aṃśeṣu aṅkān pada-sandhibhyas krama-utkramāt kṛtvā/
GS41brsphutu:540: BSS_21.18c/ vyastāni antyāt atha vā iṣus utkrama-jyā dhanus tābhyām//
GS41brsphutu:548: BSS_21.22a/ evam jīvā-khaṇḍāni alpāni bahūni vā ādya-khaṇḍāni/
GS41brsphutu:550: BSS_21.23a/ utkrama-sama-khaṇḍa-guṇāt vyāsāt atha vā %caturtha-bhāgāt yat/
GS41brsphutu:551: BSS_21.23c/ kṛtvā ukta-khaṇḍakāni jyā-%ardha-ānayanam na laghu asmāt//
